name: Adam Harrington
bio: Adam Harrington is an NBA skills development coach who has worked with some of the game's elite players including Kevin Durant. A former professional player himself, Adam brings decades of experience in breaking down shooting mechanics, ball-handling, and the mental aspects of basketball performance. He currently serves as Head Coach for Phantom BC in the Unrivaled league.
